Summary: Bright object to the left of the moon. Not moving just appeared then vanished 4 minutes later
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Hemet
There was one other sighting in Hemet on or around July 5th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy sons spotted it first then ran to tell their Dad they see "something" in the sky. Upon investigate Dad discovered the object was not a reflection on the windows object was stationary for at least 4 minutes before vanishing.
